p: Extractions of the oil from rapeseed, carotenoids from carrots, and aromas from caraway seeds were performed using an ULTRA-TURRAX ® Tube Drive System (Paris, France) [ 4, 39]. The dried vegetable materials were grounded prior to extraction. One gram of each matrix, 20 g of ceramic balls, and 10 mL of solvent ( p-menthane or n-hexane) were added into a tube with a stirring device. The obtained mixture was mechanically stirred and macerated at 4000 rpm for 60 min at 25 °C. The residue was removed by filtration and centrifuged at 9000 rpm for 10 min.
